amendment.description: Amendment sought to lower the gross annual revenue cap from $1,000,000,000 to $750,000,000 for emerging growth companies to remain eligible for the regulatory on-ramp and to strike the public float requirement for the on-ramp.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 112-409 to lower the gross annual revenue cap from $1,000,000,000 to $750,000,000 for emerging growth companies to remain eligible for the regulatory on-ramp and to strike the public float requirement for the on-ramp.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Himes amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 245 (Roll no. 103).
